org.restlet.component
Class DefaultRestletContainer

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.component.DefaultRestletContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, OriginServer, RestletContainer, Element, Maplet, Restlet, UniformInterface
public class DefaultRestletContainer
extends Object
implements RestletContainer

Default restlet container that can be easily subclassed.

Component acting as a container for call handlers named restlets. Calls are first intercepted by the container which can do various checks before effectively delegating it to one of the registered root maplets or restlets.

attach

public void attach(String pathPattern,
                   Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
Attaches a restlet class. A new instance will be created for each call.

Specified by:

Parameters:
